66591.「あニャ？ そこにいるのは\n <pc>じゃないかニャ。:
Huh? <pc>? Is that you over there,
meow?

66592.「なんで キサマが ここにいるニャ？\n もしかして オレの追っかけを\n 始め:
Why are mew here? Have you been following
me, meow?

66593.「……まあいいニャ。\n ヒマしてたとこだから 話があるなら\n 聞いてやっても:
Well, whatever... I've got nothin' going on
at the moment, so...if you have something
on your mind, go ahead and tell me, meow.

66594.<pc>は キャット・バルバドと\nリューデという ふたりの勇士の子孫を\n探し:
<pc> explained that they were
looking for the descendants of two brave
warriors named Succotash and Ryude.

66595.「……ふむ。確かに キャット・バルバドさまは\n オレのご先祖さまニャ。そして:
Mmm hmm... Well, Succotash is indeed my ancestor, meow. And in my family, this phrase has been passed down for generations,
meow...

66596.「輝くマントを求める者 現れし時\n 勇士の血を引きし ふたりの者\n いさかい:
"When shehe who seeks the radiant cloak appears, he two who bear the blood of warriors, rest your quarreling hands, and
join as one."

66597.「そして 永遠の地下迷宮の広間にて\n ともに 祈りを捧げよ。\n さすれば 海:
And pray together in the halls of the Eternal
Maze. Then the way to the Abyss Room will be
opened to you...

66598.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫が 誰なのか\n 気にはニャっていたが アヤツを見たとき:
I had wondered who the descendant of the other
brave warrior was, but when I saw him, I
realized.

66599.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫は\n あの ヒューザとかいう\n ムカつくヤツに ちが:
The other brave warrior's offspring must be
that infuriating Hyuza!

66601.「あの 泥くさい小魚野郎のヒューザは\n オレが やっつけちまったのニャー！！: I defeated that muddy little fish, Hyuza!

66602.「……その出会いは 偶然だったニャ。\n 旅の身空の者同士。ここで会ったが百年目:
The meeting was a coincidence. We are both traveling together. It's been a hundred years since we met here. Me and Ayatsu drew our
swords in silence.

66603.「時が止まったかのような にらみ合い。\n だが ひきょうなことに アヤツは\n:
It was a standoff as if time had stopped. But,
to my dismay, he threw matatavi at me, the
weak point of cats!

66604.「オレは とろんとする 身体をふるい立たせ！\n アヤツの剣を 右に！ 左に！:
I'm gonna get my limp body back on its feet!
To the right! To the left! To the left! To the
left!

66605.「アヤツの 一瞬のスキを狙い！\n キャット剣法の秘奥義 キャット空中大車輪を\:
I took advantage of her momentary lapse! I
unleashed the secret of Cat's swordsmanship,
Cat's great wheel in the air!

66606.「それで アヤツは ジ・エンドだったニャ。\n ニャーッハッハッハッ。:
And that was the end for Ayatsu. Nyah-ha-ha-
ha-ha.

66607.「……というわけで ヒューザは\n もう この世には いニャいが\n 安心するの:
...So you can rest assured that Hyuza is no
longer in this world <pc>.

66608.「アヤツなんか いなくても オレが祈れば\n 海淵の間への道を開くことなど 猫飯:
Even without Ayatsu, if I pray, I can open the
way to the Abyss Room. If you want, you can
pray together with me.

66609.「そうと決まれば さっそく\n 永遠の地下迷宮の広間へ 向かうニャ。\n <pc:
As soon as I decide to do so, I'll be on my
way to the halls of the Labyrinth of
Eternity. You should come soon, too.

66611.「<cs_pchero>が来るのが おそいんで\n ちょっと奥で 狩りをしてたニ:
I was hunting a little further back because
<cs_pchero> was slow to arrive.

66612.「……ふむ。\n たしか 海淵の間への道が開く場所は\n あっちの方だニャ。つい:
Hm...hmm. I think the path to the Abyss Room
opens that way. Follow me.

66613.「それニャあ さっそく 剣をかかげて\n 祈ってみるかニャ。せっかくだから\n:
Well then, let's start praying with Sword Held
Aloft. Since we're here, it would be good if
<cs_pchero> prayed together.

66614.リベリオは 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。:
Purrgatroyd raised his sword and began to
pray.

66615.<cs_pchero>も リベリオに合わせて\n祈ってみた……。:
<cs_pchero> also prayed for Purrgatroyd to
match...

66617.「……ニャハハハッ。ダメみたいだニャー。\n これはもう キサマは 王者になれな:
...Nyahahahahaha. It looks like it's no good. I have no choice but to give up on the fact that Kisama was destined to never become the
champion.

66618.「……ニャッ？ オレのせいじゃないニャ！\n キサマが もっと早く 王者のマント:
Meow? It's not my fault! If only you had come
to me earlier to get the Sovereign's Cloak!

66619.「そしたら あの小魚野郎のヒューザを\n 殺すこともなく ご先祖さまの教えの通り:
Then I wouldn't have had to kill that little
fish, Hyuza, and I could have helped you, as
my ancestors taught me!

66621.「ニャニャッ！？\n なぜ キサマが ここに！: Meow meow! Why is Xama here?

66622.「ちょっと 猫島に寄ったら <cs_pchero>が\n オレを探してるって ネ:
I stopped by Cat Island for a while and heard
from the cats that <cs_pchero> was looking
for me. I went out of my way to find you.

66623.「で？ なんで オレが\n ブタネコに 殺されたことになってるんだ？:
So? Why am I supposed to have been killed by a
piggy cat?

66624.「確かに ちょっと前にバッタリ会って\n お前と やり合ったが すぐに しっぽを:
Indeed, who was it that bumped into you a while back, had a run-in with you, and then promptly ran off with his tail between his
legs?

66625.「ぬぬぬぬ……。うるさいニャ！\n ちょっと お茶目なウソをついただけニャッ。: Shut up! I just told a mischievous lie.

66626.「今は ブタネコと コントやってる\n 場合じゃねえんだよな <cs_pcher:
Now is not the time for you to be playing
contraptions with pigcats <cs_pchero>. You
want the Sovereign's Cloak, don't you?

66627.「オレに そんなチカラがあるとは思えないし\n 無駄かもしれねえが やるだけやっ:
I don't think I have that kind of power, and
it may be futile, but I'll give it a shot.
It's for <cs_pchero>'s sake, after all.

66628.「おい ブタネコ。\n オレたちで 何をすればいいんだ？: Hey, pigcat. What are we supposed to do?

66629.「ブタネコって言うの やめろニャ！\n ふたりで 同時に剣をかかげて\n 祈りを:
Stop calling me a piggy cat! We should both
raise our Sword Held Aloft at the same time
and Say a Prayer!

66630.「ふん……。それじゃ さっさとやるぞ。: Well then, let's get on with it.

66631.ヒューザと リベリオは\nともに 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。:
Hyuza and Purrgatroyd both raised their swords
and began to pray.

66632.なんと 広間の床が 光りはじめ\n旅の扉が 現れた！:
The floor of the hall began to glow, revealing
a teleportal!

66633.「へえ おどろいたな……。\n オレに こんなことが できるなんてな。:
Wow, I'm surprised... that I'm capable of such
a thing.

66634.「ご先祖さまの言葉には 続きがあったのを\n 思いだしたニャ。:
I remembered that the words of my ancestors
had a continuation.

66635.「海淵の間への道は 奥深き迷宮。\n 果てなき向こうに待つは 強大なる守護者なり:
The road to the Abyss Room is a deep
labyrinth. Waiting on the endless other side
is a mighty guardian. Was it.......?

66636.「なんだか知らねえが ここから先は\n お前がやらなきゃ 意味のないことなんだろ:
I don't know what this is, but from here on out, if you don't do it, it doesn't mean anything, right? Don't worry.
can do it.

66637.「オレは 旅の途中の身だ。\n お前の帰りは 待たないからな。\n それじゃ ま:
I'm on the road. I won't wait for your return.
I'll see you again somewhere!

69782.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armor enveloped in a bright light descends
from high above...
